titleStmt.title: A form of prayer and thanksgiving to be used immediately before the General Thanksgiving in all churches and chappels within the cities of London and Westminster and ten miles about London at Morning and Evening Prayer as often as there is divine service and to be continued till further order.
titleStmt.author: Church of England.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Charles Bill and the executrix of Thomas Newcomb deceas'd ...,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in: British Library.

person.persName: Charles Bill and the executrix of Thomas Newcomb deceas'd
